name: Ooblets
summary: Ooblets is a farming, town life, and creature collection game inspired by Pokémon, Harvest Moon, and Animal Crossing. Manage your farm, grow and train your ooblets, run a shop, explore strange lands, battle wild ooblets and other ooblet trainers, and unlock the mysteries of Oob.
info:
• 中文名: 蔬菜精灵
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 游戏类型: SIM
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2020年7月15日 (Early Access)
  • 官方网站: https://ooblets.com/
  • 开发: Glumberland
  • 发行: Glumberland
